trans-unit.source: An activity that manages the execution of an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> within a workflow.
The <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Interop> activity will not appear in the workflow designer toolbox unless the workflow's project has its `Target Framework` setting set to `.Net Framework 4`.

Due to limitations in the interface types that the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Interop> activity can support, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity> cannot be used directly, but derivative activities created using the Workflow Communication Activity tool (WCA.exe) can be used.
See [Windows Workflow Foundation Tools](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178889) for details.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.Interop"></xref> class.

The collection of name-value pairs that corresponds to the metadata of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>, such as an activity’s <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name"></xref> property, or a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity"></xref> activity’s <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.While.Condition"></xref> property.
The collection of metadata of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
Gets the collection of name-value pairs that corresponds to the input and output properties of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
The collection of input and output properties of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
Gets or sets the type of the activity contained by the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.Interop"></xref> activity.
This type must derive from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity?displayProperty=fullName>.
The type of the activity contained by the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.Interop"></xref> activity.
Returns the collection of attributes for the contained <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Interop> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> interface.
The attribute collection for the contained <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
Returns the name of the class of the contained <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Interop> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> interface.
The class name of the contained <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
Returns the name of the contained <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Interop> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> interface.
The activity name of the contained <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
Returns the associated type converter for the contained <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Interop> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> interface.
The type converter for the contained <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
Returns the default event for the contained <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Interop> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> interface.
The default event for the contained <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
Returns the default property for the contained <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Interop> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> interface.
The default property for the contained <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
Returns the editor for the contained <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Interop> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> interface.
The type of the requested editor.
The editor for the contained <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
Returns the collection of events for the contained <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Interop> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> interface.
The collection of events.
Returns the collection of events for the contained <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> using the specified array of attributes as a filter.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Interop> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> interface.
The attributes used to filter the returned events.
The collection of events for the contained <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
Returns the collection of properties for the contained <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Interop> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> interface.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> that represents the collection of properties for the contained <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
Returns the collection of properties for the contained <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> using a specified array of attributes as a filter.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Interop> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> interface.
The array of attributes used to filter the properties.
A collection of properties for the contained <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
Returns the owner of the specified property descriptor or the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.Interop"></xref> activity itself if the property descriptor has no owner.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Interop> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> interface.
The property whose owner is to be retrieved.
The property owner or the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.Interop"></xref> activity itself if the property descriptor has no owner.
